<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/257cc5ee9593cd0653beca8b5945dc7fbf7f2d8d|patch 8.2.0280: Vim9: throw in :def function not caught higher up>
patch 8.2.0280: Vim9: throw in :def function not caught higher up

Problem:    Vim9: throw in :def function not caught higher up.
Solution:   Set "need_rethrow".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0280: Vim9: throw in :def function not caught higher up · vim/vim@257cc5e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0280: Vim9: throw in :def function not caught higher up · vim/vim@257cc5e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: throw in :def function not caught higher up. Solution: Set "need_rethrow".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a2f6e42ded067df8ee682c15aa246491a389b1a0|patch 8.2.0281: two placed signs in the same line are not combined>
patch 8.2.0281: two placed signs in the same line are not combined

Problem:    Two placed signs in the same line are not combined.  E.g. in the
            terminal debugger a breakpoint and the PC cannot be both be
            displayed.
Solution:   Combine the sign column and line highlight attributes.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0281: two placed signs in the same line are not combined · vim/vim@a2f6e42
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0281: two placed signs in the same line are not combined · vim/vim@a2f6e42
attachments.text: Problem: Two placed signs in the same line are not combined. E.g. in the terminal debugger a breakpoint and the PC cannot be both be displayed. Solution: Combine the s...

patch 8.2.0285: unused error message; cannot create s:var

Problem:    Unused error message. Cannot create s:var.
Solution:   Remove the error message. Make assignment to s:var work.
